commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: I could have sworn this is where we were supposed to meet...

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah, okay, but does anyone know what the heck Emma and Kanan want with us out here?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Not me. Do you, Hanamaru?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Me neither. They just said to be sure to come with an empty stomach, zura.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: It's really starting to pour, zura.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: It certainly is.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Make sure you both watch your feet.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: The instant you said that, a giant puddle appeared.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Aw geez, there's no way we can cross this without getting wet. So what's it gonna be? We gonna go around?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Oh-hoh-hoh, I don't think there's any need for that, Nico-chi.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: All you have to do...is a little bit of this!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Wow, she jumped over it like it was nothing, zura!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: I can't believe YOU of all people would jump over it! You just want to horse around, don't you?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: *Giggle* What ever makes you think that?

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Now, what are the two of you going to do? Are you gonna chicken out and go around?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Nico.

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Yeah. No way I'm goin' down without a fight either. Let's do this, Hanamaru!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Roger, zura!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru, Nico
commands.line: HIIIYAH!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Oh, they're here! Hey! Over here, girls!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Sorry to keep you waiting.

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: Sorry to ask you to come out and meet us in the rain!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Huh? Are you two okay? You're soaked from head to toe!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: We're FINE. We just tripped, okay?!

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Good thing I packed a bunch of towels just in case... Today's just the rainy day I was preparing for.

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: So, what's the plan for today?

commands.speaker: Kanan
commands.line: About that...

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Oh, hey guys!

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Ai?!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Why are you wearing that uniform?

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Do you work here?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Heehee. Actually, this is where I live. It's my family's monjayaki place!

commands.speaker: Nozomi
commands.line: Wow, I had no idea.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: There's something I wanted to try, so I asked you all to come out with us.

commands.speaker: Hanamaru
commands.line: Something you wanted to try?

commands.speaker: Nico
commands.line: Like what?

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Save the talk for later! Now get in here! Table for five!
